item.title: Tangible Interaction Workshop - Game Controller
item.description: Design and Sketching Concepts For this assignment, I tried about both versions of the game. According to the instructions, we were supposed to make the controller work for both games. First, I sketched out the current controls for each game: Then I came up with an initial design: This had a joystick on the left that would go only left and right, and a joystick on the right that would go up and down.
